on offer.translation[0].definitions[0].d: available to be bought, chosen, or used
on offer.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Activities on offer include sailing, rowing, and canoeing.
I was impressed with the designs on offer.
on offer.translation[0].definitions[1].d: for sale for a short time at a cheaper price than usual
on offer.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Lean minced beef is on offer this week.
